name: verse-backend
description: Local backend server for Verse songwriting app

scripts.build:sidecar:macos-arm64: npm run build && mkdir -p dist/sidecar ../verse-flow-main/src-tauri/binaries && esbuild dist/server.js --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --target=node18 --outfile=dist/sidecar/server.bundle.cjs && pkg dist/sidecar/server.bundle.cjs --target node18-macos-arm64 --output ../verse-flow-main/src-tauri/binaries/verse-backend-aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
